reviewText: My grandson's absolutely love it.  They would watch a lot longer if they were allowed more TV time.  Will buy more later
My son loves Wild Kratts and this compilation of episodes is just perfect for him to watch and learn about animals.
Kids love it! They have watched it over and over and over.  Educational as well.  We love wild kratts animal adventures

These are NOT NEW movies.  They are just put together in a box.  My grandson actually cried, when we opened the box and saw that he already had everyone.  Only 4 disc, not "5".  AGAIN NOTHING NEW.  Very disappointed.  Will be returning.

My almost 4 year old son LOVES the Wild Kratts, so I preordered this video as soon as I saw it.  Big mistake.  It's just a compilation of all of their other videos - Creature Adventures, Lost At Sea, Jungle Animals, and Predator Power.  Since we already own most of those, I will have to send this back.  I still give it five stars, though, because if you don't have the other videos, it is definitely worth getting!  My son knows so many animal facts from watching this show and it's really made him interested in learning more about the world around him.
The dvds are great and my 5 year old loved them especially the predator dvd. Decent price for about 20ish episodes.
Great learning for kids. Love Wild Kratts. Cartoons and learning all in one.
My 6 years old children love it. It's funny and very educative.
This was purchased as a gift for our 10 year old great-nephew and according to the thank you note I recently received, he loved it. He said he watched it for 2 solid hours and It was fantastic.
Kids love it
very nice
We Love every episode!!! Thanks Kratt brothers for making this available on DVD!!

AWESOME!!!!! What a great show.  Our boy LOVES this show.  Very informative, but not to over the top so that kids can't understand.  We bought this for a VERY long road trip.  Based on how many times he asked for this series to be played I'd say it was money well spent.
My 3 year old loves Wild Kratts. It's very educational and at the same time funny and entertaining to watch. Great buy!
So many episodes for such a great price, my 4 year old was soooooo happy when these came and I don't mind him watching multiple episodes as hey are very educational

My grandsons love the wild kratts. They went off Netflix and couldn't get them, so I purchased the tapes. Had an issue with the  sound on what but we easily returned and replaced. The children love them.
My son loves these videos, and we have stopped questioning him when he seems to be throwing out random animal facts. They all seem to be accurate.
I wish these were in order by season so I knew which ones we'd need to order the seasons for on Prime but otherwise, no complaints. My kids love these shows.
LOVE for my 3 year old grandson. He is intrigued with the adventures.
Great educational series for kids. As a parent, I enjoyed the shows and learned some as well!
fun
I absoutely adore the Kratt brothers and my kiddos absoutely love watching them as well as me. (Shhhhh don't tell them I enjoy it as much as them!)

Wild Kratts is a show about animals. It  features both animation and actual people. There is 20 different episodes included in this set. It originally was aired on PBS but since we do not have television signal in the woods;  I purchased the series on a disc. All my children love it. From the one year old to the 12 year old. It is educational as well as enjoyable for the children.
My kids (6 and 9) and I love watching the Wild Kratts as it is entertaining and educational. This is watched frequently.
My kids are stuck on Wild Kratts. This was a great way to satisfy them without ordering them separately. Entertaining and very educational.
We love the Wild Kratts like hippies loved the Grateful Dead
It's great there are 5 dvd just 2 of them are n one case. My son is love g them
My kids love this program. Very convenient to have all the DVDs in one case.
Wasn't expecting as many episodes as it came with!! Hours and excitement for my daughter!!! Wish we could find more Wild Kratts movies with that many hours!!
Five year daughter loves to watch the show on PBS kids.  We bought this as a Christmas gift and she was excited to receive it.  They are educational with silly characters.
good

We love Wild Kratts and girls love it too !  From Dad.

This DVD is great. I love it.  I love Chris, Aviva, Martin, Koki and Jimmy.  They are so helpful. I like the real Kratt Bros. too. They are so cool and really tell about the animals. I like the episodes because Chris and Martin always, always save the animals from Zach, Denita, Davio and Gourmand. I love the Creature Christmas but it is not on the DVD.  I hope they will make a Creature Christmas DVD Oh, by the way, I like all the episodes too AJM.
My 3 year old son absolutely loves these shows. And I love them because they're educational while being fun to watch, even for adults!

Best education show about animals for kids. My son has watched these guys on pbs since he was 2. He's 6 now and still watches them. The videos are great to have because incase you can't catch the air time you always can pop in the DVD. We own all that are available to purchase.
Son loves this series and having it on DVD is helpful for the car.

My kids watch these over and over again.

Solid scientific facts in a fun show.
My kids love the Kratt Bros! Used this on a car trip and they loved seeing their favorite show on the road.
My children love this series!
My son loves it..great buy
We love Wild Kratts and this has been great for the car especially on our moving road trip from Texas to California!  My boys loved getting to watch all their favorite episodes!
If you have a wild Kratz fan in your house this is a must-have. Great bang for your buck. Hours of entertainment.
The Kratts are the greatest the kids all love them from 4 to 40,  there are somany show and they learn so much about the animals.  Really great DVD especially for long car rides.
Such fun for kids

MY 2.5 yo son LOVES animals so after a search on the internet, my husband found this program on PBS.  After watching just 1 episode, he called immediately and asked me to find it on Amazon so we can keep the DVDs in the car.  So between Netflix, the PBS app, Amazon Prime, and now the DVDs, we have an endless supply of the Kratts.
We love this show because it's educational and it teaches kids the importance of animal and wide conservation, on top of it, it does't have any annoying sing songs which my husband can't stand.
My son goes crazy over these movies, learns a ton, and even teaches mom and dad!
Excellent show. Wild Kratts is an awesome some for all ages.
My nephews favorite show.
Son love this
My grandson loves this!

My 6 year old and 3 year old absolutely LOVE this TV series and have learned so much from it. So nice to find a good, clean, educational and entertaining show that teaches them about animals, habitat, animal behavior and conservation. Great message and great show for kids of all ages. We own all of them!
Lots of adventures on these DVDs great for long car rides!
what can I say, my kids are freak fanatics when it comes to animals, and Wild Kratts is one of the best informational animal shows we've seen.  Go PBS, we'll be buying more of these:)
great value lots of episodes
Kiddos love it.  Many adventures and not the same they get on Netflix.  At least not all of them.
Very educational
We love Wild Kratts! Soooo educational and entertaining. Little ones just think they're watching cartoons and don't even realize they're learning!
Outstanding! Entertaining education!

Its Wild Kratts.  Of course it is awesome.  It is entertaining (the kids are happy), educational (mom is happy), and clever (keeps the brain awake).  It's great to have a worthwhile program that can be re-watched without becoming annoying.  The program presents science facts, but also models creative problem solving and positive teamwork.
THE PRODUCT DID NOT MEET MY EXPECTATIONS.
All dvds in one, loved it!
Love it
My son loves the Wild Kratts. We purchased this for long road trips. Hours of non-fiction, yet animated fun facts about animals that keeps my little one entertained.
Grandson love these guys and has learned so much from their programs.
great
An absolute must for your little Wild Kratts fan!
Our HS science supplement.  The kids love it!
Provides hours of entertainment for kids who really love animal shows. This takes the real-life show and adds a little cartoon flavor. My 6 year old loves these shows.
My boys absolutely love it! I love that it's educational.

Can't go wrong with the kratts brothers.
Educational and entertaining
Amazing pack! My son loves all of the different videos.

I was at kitchen while my daughter is watching it, i keep hearing her laughter. When she finish the dvd, she keep telling me about the stories. I bet it must be super entertaining for her, and my hubby ends up watching it too... he say its very educational lol.
My 7yr old loved it!
It comes with 4 discs , not 5 and is a total of 9.25 hours
My grandnson love it!
I love how my daughters imagination is endless after watching the Wild Kratts. A great way to learn and explore with animals.
Everything is great except one video will not play.  Never would from the time we got it.
My grandchildren love this series, and also this DVD set. They've already watched it multiple times. It is educational and I find it interesting to watch with my grandchildren.
My son loves it!!  Enough said. :)
My son loves these wild kratts!
The kids love the Wild Kratts shows!!
Love this set - the most bang for your buck.  I'm only disappointed that there seem to be no other box sets like this for sale.  I refuse to buy one DVD for $10
Great DVD set!  My son has learned so much  from the wild kratts!  Loved it!
My son loves Wild Kratts! - great value for the money as well.
Excellent show!  It's a great way for kids to learn and be entertained at the same time!
My boys LOVE this program and they learn so much from it too!  A parent couldn't ask for a better combination!!  They would watch it for hours (if I'd let them!)

My daughter loves the PBS kids programs, but I don't love all of them as much as she does. I was so happy to find the really educational ones (like Wild Kratts and Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood) on Amazon so that I could have a better idea of what she's watching and make sure that she's getting good lessons and learning fun facts in a "different" way.

This set has a little of everything on it... good for a little Wild Kratts lover :-)  Great introduction to a lot of different animals and the vocabulary that it has built in my 4 year-old is amazing!  Definitely recommend.
I know nothing about this except my grand daughter want it for her birthday.  She gives it a big thumbs up
My children love the Wild Kratts.  I enjoy watching them as well!  Very informative - we love learning about the animals!
I ordered this DVD set for my 4 year old and he has become obsessed. The whole family loves the Kratt Brothers.
My four-year-old daughter fell in love with this series when she saw it on PBS.  The five-pack of videos is a great way to take the series with us on trips.  Very reasonably priced.
Informative and fun for kids to watch! Even adults can learn a few new things about some animals not always talked about!
Got these for my 3 year old for Christmas and he hasn't stopped watching them since he got them and his older brother likes to watch them with him.

I bought the DVD for my grandchildren as a Christmas present, so I don't know how it is. But if it is anything like the tv show I and the grandchildren will be happy. Currently our dvr has 59 Wild Kratts shows saved on it! Come Christmas we will be able to free up some space on the DVR!
My granddaughter requested this for Christmas. She'll watch it over and over again, and then tell us all about it!

Got this set as a replacement for one we had before.
Like I said, intended recipient loves it.
Very well done.

My two children love Wild Kratts!!  This show is educational and fun to watch.  This DVD box set has many of the shows that they had seen on TV - just now we can watch anytime!  I will be looking for more Wild Kratts movies!
it is a very informative dvd on animals and nature and it was packaged with care thank you for the delightful service

I bought this DVD as a gift for my Granddaughter.  She loves it and watches it repeatedly.
This gift has brought many happy hours of enjoyment.

My kid loves this show and would watch it all day if possible.  Reason for the three stars is due to the poor quality of the DVDs.  One of them (predator power) won't play at all.  Would have easily been 5 without that problem.

we absolutely love this program/DVD and my daughter has learned so much.  In fact, she has a speech/language delay but thanks to this video she speaks up a storm. She cannot stop talking about all the different animals and all the silly things that the wild kratts do.  Thanks wild Kratts for educating and entertaining my daughter!!

blessings to all

I bought two sets for my grandkids and wanted to check them out myself.  I honestly was blown away by the presentation as well as the information that is put forth in these.  The way that knowledge is imparted is fantastic in my opinion!!

Grandkids are absolutely delighted with this set.  Everything I could have hoped for.  Plenty shows to watch.  Wild Kratts are absolutely a fantastic show for kids and even adults.  I love to watch it with the kids.  I learn so much from it.  Cool how they show the real animals and then go to an animated show to make it easier for the kids to understand.

My kids absolutely love Wild Kratts but we seem to always miss it on the PBS channel.  If you have never seen it before, Wild Kratts is a show about animals that features both animation and actual people.  The show is mostly animated adventures the Wild Kratt brothers go on to find out how animals do different things.  Luckily though their new DVD has us set for awhile with 20 whole episodes on it!  Yes 20 episodes!  After watching all 20 we could probably even go back and start watching them again as the episodes never get old for my kids and after 20 they will seem somewhat fresh again going back to the beginning of the DVD.  Now these are all episodes from television but its nice to have them all together and even categorized by theme of the episode.

Creature Adventures:

Mom of a Croc
Whale of a Squid
Aardvark Town
Flight of the Draco
Mystery of Squirmy Wormy
Platypus Cafe

Stuck on Sharks

Raptor Roundup

I received this DVD to review in exchange for sharing my honest opinion.

Love that you get these all together in one box (in their single dvd cases).  Perfect if you don't want to buy each one separately and it is a good deal.
Here's what you get:

*Creature Adventures* - 2 discs in single dvd case
Mom of a Croc
Whale of a Squid
Aardvark Town
Flight of the Draco
Mystery of the Squirmy Wormy
Platypus Cafe
Build it Beaver
Voyage of the Butterflier XT
Honey Seekers
Bass Class

*Jungle Animals* - 1 disc
Walk on the Wetside
A Huge Orange Problem
Birds of a Feather
Googly-Eye:  The Night Guru

*Predator Power* - 1 disc
Stuck on Sharks
Mimic
Little Howler
Raptor Roundup

*Lost At Sea* - 1 disc
Speaking Dolphinese
Blowfish Blowout

I'm not a fan of the fact that they are coming out with discs with only 2 episodes on it...that's very inconvenient.  However, we love the series (my 6 year old girl is their biggest fan!) and we will continue to buy them, so it's not that big of a deal, I just wish they'd consider how inconvenient it is, not to mention wasteful of resources.  I love that the Creature Adventures 2 discs have 5 episodes per disc and think they should continue that way, instead of just 2.  I see that the Rainforest Rescue dvd (NOT included here) also just has 2...

Love that the dvd cases fit into the cardboard box/sleeve making travel with them much easier.
great videos
Great when scheduled TV broadcasts differ with your time schedule.  An enjoyable way to learn about the animal world.
My son loves this set. Was delivered quickly. Would recommend
Fun & educational! My grandson loves the video & watches it all the time. I like to watch it with him, too.
I think I enjoy watching this as much as my kids. I love that they are learning while they watch

Arrived on time and in great condition! We absolutely love Wild Kratts in our home. This is by far the best way to buy them instead of buying each episode individually this has 4 different disk with a bunch of episodes! It is very educational my 3 year old could tell you everything about all of the animals in this set including: what they look like, what they eat, where they sleep, how they sound, and where they are located! It is a wonderful teaching resource that is a lot of fun!
My daughters favorite cartoon

Arrived fast and packaged well and what kid doesn't like wild Kratts?! As a parent I am thrilled that my kids do because I would rather them watch something that teaches them and they enjoy all at the same time! Great deal too!
son loved it
good
